content: your right needle pick up one stitch round 3 k 32 sts k1 p 1 k2tog yo k 2 p 1 k 1 between the last stitch of the instep and the first repeat until end of the round stitch of the sole slip the slipped stitch back from round 4 as round 2 rn to ln and ssk it with the picked stitch 64 stitches on your needles ©sari nordlund 2017 this pattern is subject to copyright and is not to be used commercially or to be resold 5 repeat rounds 1-4 until your sock is 5 cm 2 toe round 9 k1 k2tog k18 ssk k1 ssk p1 k2 inches shorter than the length of your foot ending p1 k4 twice p1 k2 p1 k2tog 4 sts decrease 44 sts after a round 1 rem toe round 10 k23 p1 k2 p1 k2tog yo k2 twice toe shaping p1 k2 p1 k1 toe round 1 k1 k2tog k26 ssk k1 ssk k4 p1 toe round 11 k1 k2tog k16 ssk k1 ssk k2 p1 k2 p1 three times k4 k2tog 4 sts decrease 60 sts k4 p1 twice k2 k2tog 4 sts decrease 40 sts rem rem toe round 12 k23 p1 k2 yo ssk p1 k2 twice toe round 2 k31 k2tog yo k2 p1 k2 p1 three k1 times k2tog yo k3 toe round 13 k1 k2tog k14 ssk k1 ssk k1 p1 toe round 3 k1 k2tog k 24 ssk k1 ssk k3 p1 k4 p1 k1 twice k2tog 4 sts decrease 36 sts rem k2 p1 k1 three times k2 k2tog 4 sts decrease 56 sts rem toe round 14 k19 k1 p 1 k2tog yo k2 p1 k1 twice k1 toe round 4 k30 yo ssk p1 k2 p1 k2 three times k2 toe round 15 k1 k2tog k12 ssk k1 ssk p1 k4 p1 k2 p1 k4 p1 k2tog 4 sts decrease 32 sts rem toe round 5 k1 k2tog k22 ssk k1 ssk k2 p1 k2 p1 k2 three times k2tog 4 sts decrease 52 sts toe round 16 k17 p1 k2 yo ssk p1 k2 twice rem yo ssk p1 k1 toe round 6 k29 p1 k2 p1 k2tog yo k2 twice toe round 17 k1 k2tog k10 ssk k1 ssk k4 p1 p1 k2 p1 k2tog yo k1 k2 p1 k4 k2tog 4 sts decrease 28 sts rem toe round 7 k1 k2tog k20 ssk k1 ssk k1 p1 graft the remaining stitches together with k2 p1 k3 twice k1 p1 k1 twice k2tog 4 sts kitchener stitch repeat the instructions for the decrease 48 sts rem second sock weave in all loose yarn ends and wet block to measurements toe round 8 k26 p1 k2 p1 k2 yo ssk twice p1 k2 twice
